articles.title: MEGHAN MCCAIN: 'Top Gun: Maverick' is yet another wake-up call to WOKE Hollywood - Daily Mail
articles.description: MCCAIN: The movie isn't overly political, it isn't depressing, it isn't focusing on the flaws of the United States of America and why we suck and why our flag and national anthem aren't worth honoring.
articles.content:
My husband and I were just two people out of scores of Americans, who rushed to the movie theatres this past Memorial Day weekend to see 'Top Gun: Maverick.'
